Development build in the OP for flight input. Usage:

1. Navigate to touchball.html

2.1 For the mouse: Hold left mouse button and move to adjust pitch and yaw, hold right mouse button and move to adjust pitch and roll.

2.2 For touch screen devices: One finger to adjust pitch and yaw, two fingers to adjust pitch and roll.

Hey Rich, is the hullcam proof of concept on the telemachus source?

The source is not included; however, it is based on the hull camera code, and all Telemachus does is to pack the image data up and serve it as a webpage.
